::DrillBit::

DrillBit was woken by KitKat's words over the comm. He switched his arm
to gattaling gun mode, and ran out to KitKat's psition.
"Hello, love. Lets kick ass!" He yells, opening fire, on all Maximals.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod woke up in his room, in the CF. He started woundering the base,
looking for someone he knew.

::K-9::

K-9 woke up in his ship. He walked outside.
"Beast mode." He says, transforming, and heading for the CF.
